images.original_prompt: A circus horse.
video_prompts: A colorful circus backdrop unfurls behind the horse.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a breakdancing dog.
video_prompts: The dog begins spinning on its back legs as he breakdances.

images.original_prompt: A girl riding a horse.
video_prompts: The horse lowers its head, revealing a girl seated on its back.

images.original_prompt: A standing horse.
video_prompts: The horse gradually slows its pace until it stands still.

images.original_prompt: Pizza with pineapple.
video_prompts: Slices of pineapple appear on top of the pizza.

images.original_prompt: A parade on a street.
video_prompts: People gradually begin to fill the street, forming a vibrant parade.

images.original_prompt: A horse raising its head.
video_prompts: The horse slowly lifts its head.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a traffic jam.
video_prompts: Cars begin to fill the once-clear highway, gradually slowing to a standstill.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a yawning dog.
video_prompts: The dog's mouth gradually opens wide in a big yawn.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a coffee house in a street.
video_prompts: The shop signs gradually change to reveal a cozy coffee house on the street.

images.original_prompt: Pizza with pepperoni.
video_prompts: Pepperoni slices slowly appear on the pizza.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a dog laying down.
video_prompts: The dog gently lowers itself down, lying on the ground.

images.original_prompt: A horse in a show jumping attire.
video_prompts: The horse readies to jump as a saddle and bridle appear.

images.original_prompt: A half eaten pizza.
video_prompts: Half of the pieces gradually disappear from the pizza.

images.original_prompt: A cyclist riding in a street.
video_prompts: A cyclist gradually emerges, pedaling along the cobblestone street.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a couple holding their hands on a beach.
video_prompts: The couple on the beach gradually moves closer to each other and holds hands.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a jumping dog.
video_prompts: The dog first lifts its front legs and then leaps into the air.

images.original_prompt: A cookie next to a glass of juice.
video_prompts: The milk in the glass gradually changes to juice.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a sitting dog.
video_prompts: The dog gradually lowers its back legs, settling into a seated position.

images.original_prompt: A snow princess next to a unicorn.
video_prompts: The horse transforms into a unicorn as a snow princess gracefully appears beside it.

images.original_prompt: An image of a post apocalyptic road.
video_prompts: Dark clouds gather swiftly, casting the road in a bleak, deserted landscape.

images.original_prompt: A photo of a zebra.
video_prompts: The horse transforms into a zebra, its coat turning into black-and-white stripes.

images.original_prompt: A jumping horse.
video_prompts: The horse gracefully gathers speed and leaps into the air.

images.original_prompt: A white horse in a grass field.
video_prompts: The snow beneath the white horse melts, revealing a lush grass field.
